articles.title: Bella Hadid Makes A Statement With A Palestine-Inspired Keffiyeh Dress In Cannes - Grazia USA
articles.description: She is the moment! Amidst a roster of phenomenal looks during the Cannes Film Festival this week, Bella Hadid just debuted her most show-stopping outfit yet.
